title: Mechille Wilson Agency Launches Charity Program in Buna, TX and Debuts with Campaign in Support of The Buna Fire Department
text:
The Mechille Wilson Agency inaugurates a local charity program in the Buna, TX area to engage the support of the agency’s network of clients and business partners in benefitting the community. Its first campaign will raise funds to help the Fire Department of Buna, TX.
Buna, TX (PRWEB) September 23, 2015
The Mechille Wilson Agency in Buna, TX has announced the debut of a master charity program created especially to benefit the local community. The agency will work closely with nonprofit organizations in the area to nominate a new beneficiary every 60 days. The aim is to initiate campaigns aiding a selected individual, family or program with fundraising and other support by bringing community awareness to important local causes.
To launch their Community Program, Mechille Wilson, the agency’s principal, has chosen to introduce the Fire Department of Buna, TX. The campaign’s mission is to assist this worthy organization in their mission to help area families in time of crisis. The department is in dire need of pump trucks, and all funds raised will be directed toward these vital tools of protection.
“We’re very pleased to debut our Community Program by assisting the Buna Fire Department to better help the people of our community,” said Mechille Wilson, founder of the Mechille Wilson Agency. “These brave volunteers dedicate their own time and effort to protect and serve our citizens when they need it most. It just seems right that we do what we can to help to pull the community together in support of those who sacrifice so much for us.”
The donations page of each new campaign will feature a fully detailed story, explaining the selected cause. The Mechille Wilson Agency will also spread the word through its own database of thousands of customers, business partners, staff, neighbors and friends. To join the agency in supporting the Fire Department of Buna, TX, donors are encouraged to visit https://www.crowdrise.com/helpingoutthosewhofi/fundraiser/mechillewilsonagency and to share the page with their own friends and family through social media and email.
The Mechille Wilson Agency also produces a monthly publication, Our Hometown magazine, which reserves a full page featuring the details of each selected worthy cause. The electronic Flipbook version of the current issue of the magazine may be accessed here: http://mechillewilsonagency.com/Our-Hometown-Magazine_41 .
More information about the agency’s Community Program and various services may be found at http://mechillewilsonagency.com/ .
About The Mechille Wilson Agency
Agency owner Mechille Wilson knows many local families. Her knowledge and understanding of the people in her community help Mechille to provide her customers with an outstanding level of service. She and her team look forward to helping families protect the things which are most important to them - family, home, car and more. They can also help clients prepare a strategy to achieve their financial goals. To contact a caring expert at the Mechille Wilson Agency, please call 409-994-2009.
